00049 //
00050 // UnorderedWindowNode
00051 //
00052 // 26 January 2004 -- tds

00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_UNORDEREDWINDOWNODE_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_UNORDEREDWINDOWNODE_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/ListIteratorNode.hpp"
00059 #include <vector>
00060 #include <indri/greedy_vector>
00061 
00062 class UnorderedWindowNode : public ListIteratorNode {
00063 private:
00064   struct term_position {
00065     bool operator< ( const term_position& other ) const {
00066       return begin < other.begin;
00067     }
00068 
00069     int type;
00070     int begin;
00071     int end;
00072     int last; // index of previous entry of this type
00073   };
00074 
00075   int _windowSize;
00076   std::vector<ListIteratorNode*> _children;
00077   greedy_vector<Extent> _extents;
00078   std::string _name;
00079 
00080 public:
00081   UnorderedWindowNode( const std::string& name, std::vector<ListIteratorNode*>& children );
00082   UnorderedWindowNode( const std::string& name, std::vector<ListIteratorNode*>& children, int windowSize );
00083   int nextCandidateDocument();
00084   void prepare( int documentID );
00085   const greedy_vector<Extent>& extents();
00086   const std::string& getName() const;
00087   void annotate( Annotator& annotator, int documentID, int begin, int end );
00088 };
00089 
00090 #endif // INDRI_UNORDEREDWINDOWNODE_HPP
